name: Country flags
description: A simple API to load flag of any country

name: TimeZoneDB
description: Provides world time zone database download and API access.

name: Discord Emoji
description: Provides list of custom emojis/emoji packs for discord and slacks.

name: REST Countries
description: Provides details of all countries

name: Adorable Avatars
description: Adorable Avatars is an avatar placeholder service for developers and designers.

name: Dog API
description: DaaS (Dogs-as-a-Service), the internet's biggest collection of open source dog pictures.

name: CATAAS
description:
CATAAS is a REST API. A service that delivers images of cats. The main 
feature is that we can change the properties of images, add text, 
truncate the image, add a filter and more.

name: IP API
description: Provides general data for an IP address.

name: Robohash
description: Generate unique robot themed images from any text.

name: Some Random API
description: API for random facts and images

name: Gravatar
description: Provide your users with a globally recognized avatar.

name: Random User Generator
description: Generate random users for your app ideal for testing and example/demo purposes.

name: Random Avatars
description:
With this API you can generate random avatars for free based on user 
names or a random string if you'd prefer that (eg. Firebase Auth Uid).
UI Avatars has a simple-to-use API with no limiting or login. No usage 
tracking and no information is stored. The final images are cached, but 
nothing else. Just write name or surname, or both.

name: Dicebear Avatars
description:
This API is best suited for designers and developers to create avatar 
placeholders. But you are free to use the generated avatars for other 
purposes.

name: Spotify
description: This API has many features, I'm mentioning it mostly for it's search function.

name: New York Times
description: Get info on books in the Best Sellers List, top NYT stories and other useful New York Times related information.

name: Google Custom Search
description: Make your own custom search engine and then query it from within your app.

name: XKCD
description:
xkcd A webcomic of romance, sarcasm, math, and language.
Make your own comic app or add a funny to your app's about page.

name: math.js
description: Don't reinvent the wheel when there's one you can use for free - like this math API. You can make 1 request every ten seconds.

name: Rextester
description: Free REGEX tester and more

name: Fast SMS
description: Bulk SMS sending API, comes with a free trial.

name: Browshot
description:
An API for taking screenshots of any webpage you want at any screen 
size. Free plan comes with 100 screenshots per month and pricing for 
more is reasonable.

name: Freesound
description: Access a library of Creative Commons sounds for your app.

name: Neutrino
description:
Free for small applications a general purpose API with a lot of features
 of most interest is a bad language filter, email validation including 
verification and much more. Should you need more services they have 
reasonable monthly plans.

name: Datumbox
description:
Datumbox enables you to build applications that use Text Analysis and 
Natural Language Processing techniques. You can build applications for 
Social Media Monitoring, Search Engine Optimization tools, Parental 
Control apps, Quality and Anti-spam filters for your community or forum 
and various other applications that require analyzing text.

name: ODWeather
description: Free weather API.

name: Mailbox Validator
description:
The Single Email Validation API does validation on a single email 
address to help you eliminate invalid and unreachable email addresses. 
It checks for email syntax, MX record, MX server connection, email 
greylisting, free email, disposable email, suppressed email, role email,
 high risk email, catch-all email and so on. See immediate results for 
your email validation.

name: Fun Generators
description: A lot of fun, random, quirky, sometimes useful generators. All free.

name: Fun Translations
description:
A large number of movie and unusual languages - ratelimited to 60 API 
calls per day (5 an hour) for each group of languages. Suggested use: 
offer paying VIP users of your apps access to this API, a bit like 
Discord Nitro :)

name: JSONBox
description: A free HTTP based JSON storage.

name: os-thm API
description: A free API for themes, only for .os-thm extension. It is created by Sketchware User, here is project link for learning more about it: http://link.sketchub.in/ostheme

name: TeamMusic's musics API
description: A free API from TeamMusic's database for songs.

name: Codehub API
description: Java Codes for sketchware in advance format

name: Open Skills
description:
A complete and standard data store for canonical and emerging skills, 
knowledge, abilities, tools, technolgies, and how they relate to jobs.
Created by Work Data Initiative
